name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Curtis BRANDON, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Curtis BRANDON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
Prior appeal, 485 Pa. 215, 401 A.2d 735.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ivan Abrams, Pittsburgh, (Court-appointed), David Max Baer, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Charles W. Johns, Kemal Alexander Mericli, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
412 A.2d 1375
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Curtis BRANDON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 10, 1980.
Argued March 3, 1980.
Decided April 10, 1980.
Ivan Abrams, Pittsburgh, (Court-appointed), David Max Baer, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Charles W. Johns, Kemal Alexander Mericli, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
